## Public Notice - Invitation to Bid
### Notice Title: Transport Canada - Aircraft Equipment

**Reference Number**: cb-503-9030680
**Amendment Number**: 1

**Publication Date**: May 23, 2024
**Bid Submission Deadline**: June 10, 2024, 11:00 AM EST
**Contract Commencement Date**: June 12, 2024
**Contract Completion Date**: July 3, 2024

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Bidder Inclusion**: Invitations are open only to pre-qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Bell Textron Canada
* Canada West Avionics
* Mid Canada
* Alpine Aerotech
* Maxcraft
* Aero Supplies
* Execaire

**Request for Proposal Documents**: Bid documents were distributed directly to invited suppliers by the contracting officer via electronic mail. Suppliants are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

**Inquiries and Submissions**: Inquiries related to the RFP requirement shall be submitted to the Contracting Authority listed below:

Yula Zourdos
Aircraft Services Directorate
Transport Canada
Building T-58, 200 Comet Private
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1V 7B2
Phone: (343) 552-8343
Email: [yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca](mailto:yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca)

**Opportunity for Qualification**: Suppliers are encouraged to submit their requests to the Supply Arrangement Authority, who will forward the information to both the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Government of Canada's Supply Arrangement Program.

Rick Long
Public Services Procurement Canada
Email: [Rick.long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Rick.long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice Details**: A Notice will be posted periodically to allow additional suppliers to become prequalified under the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 series.
